alert.note: Alert for Culpeper; King George; Rappahannock; Southern Fauquier; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 07 at 4:26AM EST until January 07 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one-quarter of a mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Rappahannock, Culpeper, Stafford, Spotsylvania, King George and Southern Fauquier Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Black ice is likely on some roadways, especially elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for icy roadways causing slippery conditions, especially on elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses.

area.areaDesc: Culpeper; King George; Rappahannock; Southern Fauquier; Spotsylvania; Stafford
